#: This is a Wayland equivalent for tools like autorandr
name: kanshi

#: Plugin for QT 5 apps on Wayland
name: qt5-wayland

#: Sway is a tiling Wayland compositor and a drop-in replacement for
the i3 window manager for X11
name: sway

#: Idle mangement helps to to sleep, turn off screen, lock, etc.
name: swayidle

#: Wayland is intended as a simpler replacement for X, easier to develop
name: wayland

#: Xwayland: runs X clients under Wayland
name: xorg-server-xwayland
